hm2PlatformPortSecurity.name: hm2PlatformPortSecurity
hm2PlatformPortSecurity.contactinfo: Postal: Stuttgarter Str. 45-51 72654 Neckartenzlingen Germany Phone: +49 7127 140 E-mail: hac.support@belden.com
hm2PlatformPortSecurity.description: The Hirschmann Private Platform2 MIB for Port Security Feature. Copyright (C) 2011. All Rights Reserved.

hm2AgentGlobalPortSecurityMode.name: hm2AgentGlobalPortSecurityMode
hm2AgentGlobalPortSecurityMode.description: Mode showing whether at the global level, port security is enabled or not.

hm2AgentPortSecurityTable.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityTable
hm2AgentPortSecurityTable.description: A table for Port Security and associated functionality.

hm2AgentPortSecurityEntry.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityEntry
hm2AgentPortSecurityEntry.description: Represents entry for port security table

hm2AgentPortSecurityMode.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityMode
hm2AgentPortSecurityMode.description: Mode showing whether at port level security is enabled or not.

hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicLimit.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicLimit
hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicLimit.description: This variable signifies the limit of dynamically locked MAC addresses allowed on a specific port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticLimit.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticLimit
hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticLimit.description: This variable signifies the limit of statically locked MAC addresses allowed on a specific port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapMode.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapMode
hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapMode.description: This variable is used to enable or disable the sending of new violation traps designating when a packet with a disallowed MAC address is received on a locked port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticMACs.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticMACs
hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticMACs.description: This variable displays the statically locked MAC addresses for port. The list displayed in a particular fashion : 2 a0:b1:c2:d1:e3:a1,11 a0:b1:c2:d3:e4:f5 (i.e., VLAN MAC pairs separated by commas).

hm2AgentPortSecurityLastDiscardedMAC.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityLastDiscardedMAC
hm2AgentPortSecurityLastDiscardedMAC.description: This variable displays the vlan-id and source MAC address of the last packet that was discarded on a locked port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressAdd.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressAdd
hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressAdd.description: This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id and MAC address to be added to the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port. The VLAN id and MAC address combination would be entered in a particular fashion like :- 2 a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1(the vlan-id and MAC address separated by a blank-space).

hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressRemove.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressRemove
hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressRemove.description: This MIB variable accepts a VLAN id and MAC address to be removed from the list of statically locked MAC addresses on a port.. The VLAN id and MAC address combination would be entered in a particular fashion like :- 2 a0:b0:c0:d1:e2:a1(the vlan-id and MAC address separated by a blank-space).

hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressMove.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressMove
hm2AgentPortSecurityMACAddressMove.description: When this object is enabled, all the dynamically locked MAC addresses will be moved to statically locked addresses on a port. GET operation on this object will display disable.

hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicCount.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicCount
hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicCount.description: The current number of dynamically locked MAC addresses on this port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticCount.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticCount
hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticCount.description: The current number of statically locked MAC addresses on this port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapCount.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapCount
hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapCount.description: The number of active violations for which a violation trap was sent on this port. This counter is only valid when hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapMode is enabled

hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapFrequen.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapFrequency
hm2AgentPortSecurityViolationTrapFrequen.description: The minimum seconds between two successive violation traps on this port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityAutoDisable.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityAutoDisable
hm2AgentPortSecurityAutoDisable.description: This object indicates whether a port is auto-disabled when the configured threshold is reached.

hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicTable.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicTable
hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicTable.description: A table for Port Security Dynamic and associated functionality.

hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicEntry.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicEntry
hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicEntry.description: Represents entry for port MAC Locking table

hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicVLANId.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicVLANId
hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicVLANId.description: Source VLAN id of the packet that is received on the dynamically locked port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicMACAddress.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicMACAddress
hm2AgentPortSecurityDynamicMACAddress.description: Source MAC address of the packet that is received on the dynamically locked port.

hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticTable.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticTable
hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticTable.description: A table for Port Security Static and associated functionality.

hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticEntry.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticEntry
hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticEntry.description: Represents entry for port MAC Locking table

hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticVLANId.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticVLANId
hm2AgentPortSecurityStaticVLANId.description: VLAN id of the statically locked address .

hm2AgentPortSecurityViolation.name: hm2AgentPortSecurityViolation
hm2AgentPortSecurityViolation.description: Sent when a packet is received on a locked port with a source MAC address that is not allowed.
